transcript: â€‰ Someone on Reddit said when Amazon has an inventory of something, they don't check the safety/quality of the products. They just dump everything together. This model is profitable for them. So you can do your research and make sure it is a reputable brand and still end up with unsafe poorly made products. Also Amazon will make their own products based on what their competitors sell that is successful. For example if they notice lots of people are buying a brand of stainless steel cups they will make their own and market it heavily on their website undercutting the competition. They may even remove the competition from the website. I just don't trust them at all.
